title: Black Rightwards Arrow

adjectives: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the east when facing north
Designating the side of the body which is positioned to the east if one is facing north. This arrow points to the right: ?
Situated in or facing or moving toward the east
Situated or lying in or towards the east; eastward.
Immediately following in time or order
Coming next, either in sequence or in time.
Showing the way by conducting or leading; imposing direction on
verbs: Change location; move, travel, or proceed, also metaphorically
To change (from one value to another).
To move or travel (from one location to another).
To change the location of an object.
To transfer a file from one location to another. After the file is transferred, there is only one copy of the file, in the new location.
To move an object one pixel at a time.
nouns: A mark to indicate a direction or relation
A mark to indicate a direction or relation.
A sign or symbol used to indicate a direction (e.g. \to).
East is a noun, adjective, or adverb indicating direction or geography.
One of the four cardinal directions
The cardinal compass point that is at 90 degrees

description:
An arrow, pointing right.

See the glossary for information on the term black in unicode character names.
apple_vendor_description: The right arrow emoji on Apple devices is rendered with a bold, vibrant stroke, exuding a sense of forward momentum and direction. Its sharp, clean edges and subtle gradient shading, characteristic of Apple's design, suggest precision and clarity in guiding the user. This emoji is frequently employed to indicate progression, continuation, or to point towards the next step in a digital interaction.
